entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 2:54 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
